idea:
We, Dream Team Business Solution Private Limited  is a new fruits and veggies delivery service that brings a card machine home, so that our customers don’t have to step out. We provide on-demand delivery for fresh fruits & vegetables.

EV Fresh’s Tamper-proof and Touch-free delivery method ensures safety and hygiene during transportation. We use IOT enabled touch-free method for delivery. We have enabled AI CHAT-BOT.
name: DREAMTEAM BUSINESS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Unosearch Internet Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a software product company focussed on providing SAAS to the Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs).

Our Company aims to simplify online marketing for SMEs by making it affordable, profitable & results can be experienced by the customer in a very short period.


Our Company has developed the software (UNOSEARCH) which will assist the SME user to setup their website and do the online marketing of their products and / or services. We are providing the expertise in the form of the software therefore we call it an Expertise as a Software (EaaS), which enable SMEs with minimal digital skilled resources also to benefit.


Our product helps SMEs to increase their business, by generating assured customer footfalls & phone calls from organic search engines, and hyper local social media.
name: UNOSEARCH INTERNET TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a Health EdTech and services company whose sole and abiding objective is creating adequate capacity of clinically trained skilled and upskilled healthcare forces for emerging urban and rural India’s healthcare needs.

The core team consists of highly experienced professionals who are supported by strong and credible advisory board . The team has a high degree of social and civic responsibility awareness.

We are enablers for healthcare learning, skills and services through technology and classrooms.
